description: React component for displaying and managing playlist details, including track list, adding/removing tracks, and deleting playlist.

methods.name: PlaylistDetail()
methods.description: React functional component rendering playlist details, tracks list, and providing controls for editing, adding, removing, and deleting playlists.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Fetches and updates the playlist data from the backend API.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Handles the deletion of the playlist after user confirmation.

methods.name: onAddTrack
methods.description: Handles adding a new track to the playlist via user input.

methods.name: onRemoveTrack
methods.description: Removes a specified track from the playlist.
